title: 2Â  Why Built-up Indices Matter
text:
Urbanization is one of the biggest global changes of our time.
To study urban heat islands, flooding, and land-use change, researchers need to accurately map built-up areas.
Built-up indices are formulas that combine different satellite bands to highlight urban surfaces â€“ like NDVI for vegetation, but for cities.
